void OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.IUserAccountService.DeleteUser ( UUID  userID,
string  password,
bool  archiveInformation,
bool  wipeFromDatabase 
)

Delete a user from the database permanently.

Parameters:
userID The user's ID
password The user's password
archiveInformation Whether or not we should store the account's name and account information so that the user's information inworld does not go null
wipeFromDatabase Whether or not we should remove all of the user's data from other locations in the database
